projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

body.l: viṣayavatī vā pravṛttir utpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanī || YS_1.35 ||
kṣīṇavṛtter abhijātasyeva maṇer grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu tatsthatadañjanatā samāpattiḥ || YS_1.41 ||
tatra śabdārthajñānavikalpaiḥ saṃkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ || YS_1.42 ||
etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā || YS_1.44 ||
tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhān nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ || YS_1.51 ||
pariṇāmatāpasaṃskāraduḥkhair guṇavṛttivirodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ || YS_2.15 ||
kṛtārthaṃ prati naṣṭam apy anaṣṭaṃ tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt || YS_2.22 ||
tadabhāvāt saṃyogābhāvo hānaṃ taddṛśeḥ kaivalyam || YS_2.25 ||
yogāṅgānuṣṭhānād aśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptir ā vivekakhyāteḥ || YS_2.28 ||
vitarkā hiṃsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam || YS_2.34 ||
tasmin sati śvāsapraśvāsayor gativicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ || YS_2.49 ||
tad evārthamātranirbhāsaṃ svarūpaśūnyam iva samādhiḥ || YS_3.3 ||
tataḥ punaḥ śāntoditau tulyapratyayau cittasyaikāgratāpariṇāmaḥ || YS_3.12 ||
śabdārthapratyayānām itaretarādhyāsāt saṃkaras tatpravibhāgasaṃyamāt sarvabhūtarutajñānam || YS_3.17 ||
na ca tat sālambanaṃ tasyāviṣayībhūtatvāt || YS_3.20 ||
sopakramaṃ nirupakramaṃ ca karma tatsaṃyamād aparāntajñānam ariṣṭebhyo vā || YS_3.22 ||
sattvapuruṣayor atyantāsaṃkīrṇayoḥ pratyayāviśeṣo bhogaḥ parārthāt svārthasaṃyamāt puruṣajñānam || YS_3.35 ||
te samādhāv upasargā vyutthāne siddhayaḥ || YS_3.37 ||
bandhakāraṇaśaithilyāt pracārasaṃvedanāc ca cittasya paraśarīrāveśaḥ || YS_3.38 ||
udānajayāj jalapaṅkakaṇṭakādiṣv asaṅga utkrāntiś ca || YS_3.39 ||
bahir akalpitā vṛttir mahāvidehā tataḥ prakāśāvaraṇakṣayaḥ || YS_3.43 ||
tato manojavitvaṃ vikaraṇabhāvaḥ pradhānajayaś ca || YS_3.48 ||
jātilakṣaṇadeśair anyatānavacchedāt tulyayos tataḥ pratipattiḥ || YS_3.53 ||
tārakaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ sarvathāviṣayam akramaṃ ceti vivekajaṃ jñānam || YS_3.54 ||
nimittam aprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedas tu tataḥ kṣetrikavat || YS_4.3 ||
pravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittam ekam anekeṣām || YS_4.5 ||
jātideśakālavyavahitānām apy ānantaryaṃ smṛtisaṃskārayor ekarūpatvāt || YS_4.9 ||
hetuphalāśrayālambanaiḥ saṃgṛhītatvād eṣām abhāve tadabhāvaḥ || YS_4.11 ||
vastusāmye cittabhedāt tayor vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ || YS_4.15 ||
na caikacittatantraṃ vastu tadapramāṇakaṃ tadā kiṃ syāt || YS_4.16 ||
sadā jñātāś cittavṛttayas tatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvāt || YS_4.18 ||
cittāntaradṛśye buddhibuddher atiprasaṅgaḥ smṛtisaṃkaraś ca || YS_4.21 ||
tad asaṃkhyeyavāsanābhiś citram api parārthaṃ saṃhatyakāritvāt || YS_4.24 ||
prasaṃkhyāne 'py akusīdasya sarvathā vivekakhyāter dharmameghaḥ samādhiḥ || YS_4.29 ||
tadā sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya jñānasyānantyāj jñeyam alpam || YS_4.31 ||
puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ guṇānāṃ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyaṃ svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktir iti || YS_4.34 ||
